question.title: How to add x5t header to JWT generated through Spring Authorization Server
question.body:
I am creating an OAuth2 authorization server using Spring Authorization Server.

For generating JWT, I have configured the RSAKey. I have set the certificate's SHA-1 thumprint using RSAKey.Builder.x509CertThumbprint method. However, once I generate the token, the x5t header is not included.

If I set the SHA-256 thumbprint, then that is added in the generated JWT's header.

Also, the method RSAKey.Builder.x509CertThumbprint is marked deprecated. But I need to have the x5t header added. Is there any way I can add it?
